package.name: acdk_vfile
package.title: ACDK Virtual Files (acdk_vfile)
package.shortdescription: acdk_vfile implements virtual file systems for zip and tar files, which can used as plugin for the ACDK File framework.
package.copyright: Copyright © 2000 - 2005 by Roger Rene Kommer, artefaktur
package.description:
acdk_vfile provides implements %ref[virtual file systems, acdk_io_FileSystem] for the %cref[acdk::io::File] fassade for transparent access to zip and tar files.
Please refer to %ref[acdk_vfile_man] for examples.
The utility %ref[acdk_vfile_file2rc, acdk_vfile_file2rc_man] transfer any binary data to a C-Struktur to link it to an application accessible via the %cref[acdk::io::RessourceFileSystem].
The little utility %ref[acdk_vfile_convert, acdk_vfile_convert_man] is a ZIP and TAR unpacker, uses just as a little demo for the zip and tar file system plugin features.
Another File plugin is available for FTP servers in the %ref[acdk_net, acdk_net] package.
